subject: Football
Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: Matt Walsh, a former video assistant for the New England Patriots, will meet with the N.F.L. commissioner on Tuesday. The following is a timeline of how Walsh, the Patriots and the league got to this point.
